model

Class MazeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MazeList

  • public class MazeList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contain list of Elements. It's represent structure of maze. Its a part of engineering project prepared by author at Silesian University of Technology, Gliwice
    Version:
    2.0 2016-01-22
    Author:
    Mariusz Nowak

      • getDivision

        public int[] getDivision()
        Method count how many percent of maze is putted to each quarters of board. You can use this method to build most interested maze.
        Returns:
        int [] Four element table with percentage filling of each quarter. there are in table: 0 - left bottom 1 - left top 2 - right top 3 - right bottom
        Since:
        V2.0 2016-01-22

      • getLastSize

        public int getLastSize()
        Method return size of maze before las mutation. Parameter "lastSise" is not updated automatically. Only method setLastSize can change it.
        Returns:
        int Serial of maze.
        Since:
        V2.0 2016-01-22
        See Also:
        setLastSize(int)

      • setLastSize

        public void setLastSize(int lastSize)
        Method set size of maze before las mutation. Parameter "lastSise" is not updated automatically. Only this method can change it. You can use it to store size of mutation before mutation.
        Parameters:
        lastSize - Copy here last size of maze.
        Since:
        V2.0 2016-01-22

        public void setGeneration(int generation)

        Parameters:
